name: Super Delivery Boy
overview: Inspired by the classic Japanese platformers from Konami/Hudson Soft but also with modern elements from games like Katana Zero and Dead Cells. This is a charming little platformer that will feature lovely background detail, smooth scrolling, coin collection, different enemies and multiple areas. For those of you who want to know about the changes in this test download : There's new enemies such as frogs, rolling stones and birds, new platform objects, new interactables including an Amiga and a fridge, new house and levels, and more for you to discover.
